desc: Graphic t-shirts, sweatshirts, stickers, and apparel made for you to express yourself. Whether that be Michigan themed, our classic designs, or more. Plus, if you're into something that is even more yours, get a hold of us for a custom t-shirts, sweatshirts, and other apparel.

layout.text: 30% off LOVE items for Pride month! Use code: LOVE22 at checkout.
